entity.name: Melania Trump
entity.description: Former US First Lady Melania Trump

text: @realDonaldTrump @Facebook I heard that the real reason you are taking hydroxychloroquine is to help with your syphilis. Nothing to do with Coronavirus. It’s part of the reason your brain is deteriorating as quickly as it is. No wonder Melania sleeps in a different room and has been seen with other men!
